title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 25 WIRED-Approved Gifts for Frequent Travelers (2025)
items.description: For the frequent flier who treats the Delta Sky Club like their second home.

items.title: Best Home Depot Black Friday Deals
items.description: Black Friday lasts a month this year at The Home Depot, including half off select tools and tool sets.

items.title: The Best Mushroom Gifts for Your Fungi Friend (2025)
items.description: We're talking mushroom gummies, shiitake-infused cooking oil, and even an automated monotub for serious spore enthusiasts.

items.title: Peloton recalls 833,000 bikes after reports of injuries
items.description: The Consumer Product Safety Commission is warning Peloton users to stop using the affected bikes immediately.

items.title: Spotify now lets you see weekly listening stats
items.description: Spotify is adding new feature called "Listening stats" that will show users weekly numbers about their listening habits.

items.title: Why Benchmark made a rare crypto bet on trading app Fomo, with $17M Series A
items.description: The founders of Fomo, a consumer crypto trading app that launched in May, took an unusual route to raising capital.

items.title: 11 Best Cheap Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: From surprisingly good $300 Chromebooks to excellent $650 Windows laptops, these are the best budget laptops we’ve tested.

items.title: What to Do in St. Paul and Minneapolis If You’re Here for Business (2025)
items.description: Where to stay, play, eat, and work, while on a business trip to Minneapolis and St. Paul.

items.title: Inception raises $50 million to build diffusion models for code and text
items.description: Diffusion models already power AI image generators, but Inception thinks they can be even more powerful applied in software development.

items.title: Mastodon’s latest software update brings quote posts to all server operators
items.description: Mastodon's latest software version brings quote posts with added controls to all servers.
